attributes.action: Provide Sticker Boards for local businesses and artists to advertise in towns
attributes.additional_details: Stickers provide a portal to local commerce.  You can find new music, artists and startup businesses in your area by looking for the stickers.  Currently certain places, Streatham for example have a whole street where the remains of stickers look unsightly and the plastic is thrown away.  Stickers indicate a vibrant culture and they help bring people together for business, creativity and fun.  Providing boards would reduce the amount of stickers posted on street furniture.  Stickermonster.co.uk
attributes.background:
Support our Local and Cultural Economy:  Give Local Creatives and Startups a place to legally post stickers for free.
A whole new community notice board for stickers plus boards on lamp posts.  Councils waste a lot of time money and plastic & harm the local economy by removing stickers from towns.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
